circumstances: While in cruising altitude along the east coast of Florida, one of the engine failed. The pilot reduced his altitude and ditched the airplane off West Palm Beach. He was seriously injured while the aircraft was lost.
probable_cause:
Engine failure in normal cruise due to inadequate preflight preparation. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Lack of familiarity with aircraft,
- Mismanagement of fuel, 
- Fuel exhaustion, 
- Aircraft came to rest in water, 
- Forced landing off airport on water.
